price: Uwuzoba yizeye kuzohura n’Imana Allah Ikamuhembera ivyo yakoze, namenye mu vy’ukuri ko isango ry’Imana Allah ryo kuzura ibiremwa kugira bihemberwe ivyo vyakoze, riri hafi kugera, ni na Yo Nyenukwumva, Irumva ibivugwa n’ibiremwa; Nyenubumenyikurivyose, Irazi neza ivyo bikora n’ivyo bizirikana.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
